########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND scala_sources
    detector_impl.cc
)

set(scala_sources "${scala_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT scala_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT scala_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-scala SHARED ${scala_sources})

# set(Mosquitto_libs
#         /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmosquitto.so
#         /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmosquitto.so.1)
# set(Mosquitto_libs /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmosquitto.so.1)

# find_library(Mosquitto_libs)

# pkg_check_modules(Mosquitto IMPORTED_TARGET libmosquitto REQUIRED)
# target_link_libraries(gnuradio-scala PUBLIC Mosquitto_libs)

target_link_libraries(gnuradio-scala gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio::gnuradio-fft libmosquitto.so)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-scala
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-scala PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_scala_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-scala PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-scala)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
include_directories("/usr/local/include")
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_scala_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-scala)

if(NOT test_scala_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_scala_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_scala_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("scala_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
